general.gigTitle: design and develop and customize shopify website and dropshipping store

sellerCard.oneLiner: We are here to help, Don't waste your time and money looking elsewhere
sellerCard.description:
Hi
With over nine years of professional experience in web development and design, we have established ourselves as skilled and reliable experts in the field. Our diverse portfolio showcases successful collaborations with a wide range of clients, each with unique requirements and challenges. From small startups to established businesses, we have consistently provided tailored web solutions that meet our clients’ specific needs. Not only do we excel in technical skills, but we also prioritize user experience (UX) and design principles. We are available 24/7 to address any queries related to web.

description.content:
Do you want to develop and customize shopify website and dropshipping store for your brand or start-up?


Don't worry. You are in right place. I will develop, fix and customize shopify website and dropshipping store, mobile friendly and all device supported. I can develop a theme from scratch, customize your existing theme and implement or fix any issues in your Shopify theme. I am passionate to develop Shopify websites and have the capability to create extraordinary custom work with high visual impact according to the needs and requirements of the clients.


What you will receive:

  • Full Shopify Store Creation
  • Shopify Theme Development
  • Shopify Theme customization
  • Custom-designed store development
  • Theme based store setup
  • Adding custom functionality to the store
  • Creating new sections and blocks in your store
  • Fixing errors and issues in your store
  • Adding trust badges in your store
  • Complete Migration from other platforms to Shopify
  • Set up Shipping rates
  • Set up Discounts
  • Integrate Payment Gateway
  • Add Static Pages and Custom Pages
  • And much more

Price may vary on your final requirements


Please contact me first before placing any order. So we will able to avoid order cancellation.

slide.name: design and develop and customize shopify website and dropshipping store

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Shopify store and My staff account. or I will make one using my account. Once development finish i will transfer ownership to your account.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are You able to do custom work ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can build it features or full store upon your requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you work on Custom Designs Like Figma, PSD or AI?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do. Please send me the design file. I will provide you the quote based on your specific desing.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you customize existing shopify theme?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes I will customize any shopify theme for you

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you develop the theme from scratch?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can develop a shopify theme from scratch for you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you also manage ecommerce/Shopify stores?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I manage stores on monthly basis. Feel free to reach out to discuss this.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I contact you for assistance after the store is completed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I offer 15 days of guidance/support after handing over the store. I can guide you with anything related to e-commerce such as your ads/ marketing plan / developing a business mindset etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need you to fill out the order requirements and provide access to the store (if you already have one) or I am a registered Shopify Partner and I can create a new store for you through my Shopify Partners account.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: I will create a standard Shopify store

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: Redesign Your homepage or Product Page, Making new sections, Banner Dynamic etc

packageList.title: Premium
packageList.description: Full Shopify Ratina Ready Site with All customizations and Your Thought To reality.

reviews.comment: Expert-Coder delivered exceptional quality with professional and bug-free code, showcasing impressive expertise! Working with them was great due to their deep understanding and stellar cooperation— they truly went above and beyond. Happy to recommend them for others on website development, code fixing and all round tailored solutions, they were brilliant.
Once again, fantastic development work! He took our design and our overall concept and really brought it all to life on the web. Will be working with you for as long as you will have us!
A competent seller who knows what he is doing.
